entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Grande Prairie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -10.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grande Prairie Airport 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -10.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -12.0°C
Wind: NNE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
